qa.name: Spectral Sarah
qa.appearance: Translucent with a soft blue glow

json_to_edit.voice_over: In death, we sought answers to questions left unanswered in life.
json_to_edit.description: Spectral Sarah leads a group of ghosts in an old, abandoned mansion to uncover a century-old mystery.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Creaking floorboards, whispers in the wind
json_to_edit.name: Ghostly Reunion
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A group of ghosts, led by Spectral Sarah, gather in an abandoned mansion to solve a long-standing mystery.

qa.action: The abandoned Victorian mansion looms in the moonlight, surrounded by swirling fog.

hf.action: Spectral Sarah leads a group of translucent ghosts through the mansion's grand entrance.

tr.action: The ghosts gather around an old desk, examining faded documents and photographs.

xc.action: Sarah's ethereal hand points to a crucial clue in an ancient ledger.

ka.sfx_keywords: footsteps on creaky floors, whispering voices
ka.action: The camera follows the ghosts as they float through various rooms, searching for more evidence.

fn.action: The ghosts ascend a grand staircase, their forms illuminated by a flash of lightning through a large window.

af.action: Sarah's eyes widen as she realizes the truth behind the century-old mystery.

edit_command: Add one more shot to the scene.

yz.action: A ghostly figure discovers a hidden compartment in the wall, revealing a cache of old letters and a mysterious locket.

label.rationale: we can add one more shot to the scene as requested. as a professional movie co-director, i'll create a new shot that complements the existing narrative and adds depth to the ghostly investigation. i'll place this new shot between the tracking shot and the low angle shot, as it provides a natural progression in the story. the new shot will focus on a moment of tension and revelation, building up to sarah's final realization in the last shot.
